original_text: As it is written: “I have made you a father of many nations.” He is our father in the sight of God, in whom he believed—the God who gives life to the dead and calls into being things that were not.
korean_text: 기록된 바 내가 너를 많은 민족의 조상으로 세웠다 하심과 같으니 그가 믿은 바 하나님은 죽은 자를 살리시며 없는 것을 있는 것으로 부르시는 이시니라

sentences.original_text: I have made you a father of many nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 많은 민족의 아버지로 삼았다

sentences.original_text: the God who gives life to the dead
and calls into being things that were not
sentences.korean_translation: 없는 것을 있는 것처럼 부르시는 분
